description:
An App for students to save their timetable, homework, notes and exams. This is an improved version of the app from ulan17 . With this app you can manage your timetable, your homework, exams, teachers or notes. The app also automatically switches your phone to do-not-disturb mode during classes and back again afterwards. In addition, it always shows you a notification with your next subject. Some other features I added:
  • New Notifications (also about the current lesson)
  • Weekly View
  • Automatically turn on/off Do-Not-Disturb
  • Dark mode
  • Backup/Restore
  • Shortcuts
  • Splash Screen
  • And some onClick Intents, e.g. If you click the phone number in the teacher-activity the phone app will be opened
  • Some more little ui changes
